text: The Pacific island nation Nauru (NRU) was at the Summer Olympic Games first in the 1996 games in Atlanta. The country was then in Sydney in 2000, in Athens in 2004, and in Beijing in 2008.Nauru at the Olympics , The Telegraph The nation is known for its weightlifting tradition. All seven athletes have been weightlifters. Nauru is the smallest nation (by population) in the 202 member International Olympic Committee. ==References== ==Other websites== *Nauru . Olympics at Sports-Reference.com Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Nauru at the Olympics
